hints.title: Entropy Dissipation Under Cloning (Mean-Field Sketch)
hints.content:
40: :label: lem-mean-field-cloning-sketch
41: 
42: **Hypotheses:**
43: 
44: 1. $\mu, \pi$ are probability measures on $\Omega = X_{\text{valid}} \times V_{\text{alg}} \subset \mathbb{R}^{2d}$ with smooth densities:
45:    - $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi \in C^2(\Omega)$
46:    - $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi > 0$ on $\Omega$ (strictly positive)
47: 
48: 2. $\pi = \pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave (Axiom 3.5):
49:    $$\rho_\pi(z) = \exp(-V_{\text{QSD}}(z))$$
50:    for convex $V_{\text{QSD}}$
51: 
52: 3. $T_{\text{clone}}: \mathcal{P}(\Omega) \to \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$ is the mean-field cloning operator with:
53:    - Generator: $S[\rho] = S_{\text{src}}[\rho] - S_{\text{sink}}[\rho]$
54:    - Post-cloning noise variance: $\delta^2$
55:    - Cloning probability: $P_{\text{clone}}(V_i, V_j) = \min(1, V_j/V_i) \cdot \lambda_{\text{clone}}$
56: 
57: 4. **Fitness-QSD Anti-Correlation**:
58:    $$\log V[z] = -\lambda_{\text{corr}} V_{\text{QSD}}(z) + \log V_0$$
59:    for $\lambda_{\text{corr}} > 0$
60: 
61: 5. **Regularity bounds**:
62:    - $0 < \rho_{\min} \leq \rho_\mu(z) \leq \rho_{\max} < \infty$
63:    - $0 < V_{\min} \leq V[z] \leq V_{\max} < \infty$
64: 
65: **Conclusion (Conjectured):**
66: 
67: For $\mu' = T_{\text{clone}} \# \mu$ with infinitesimal time step $\tau$:
68: 
69: $$
70: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu' \| \pi) - D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) \leq -\tau \beta \, D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(\tau^2)
71: $$
72:
hints.raw_directive:
37: ## Lemma Statement
38: 
39: :::{prf:lemma} Entropy Dissipation Under Cloning (Mean-Field Sketch)
40: :label: lem-mean-field-cloning-sketch
41: 
42: **Hypotheses:**
43: 
44: 1. $\mu, \pi$ are probability measures on $\Omega = X_{\text{valid}} \times V_{\text{alg}} \subset \mathbb{R}^{2d}$ with smooth densities:
45:    - $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi \in C^2(\Omega)$
46:    - $\rho_\mu, \rho_\pi > 0$ on $\Omega$ (strictly positive)
47: 
48: 2. $\pi = \pi_{\text{QSD}}$ is log-concave (Axiom 3.5):
49:    $$\rho_\pi(z) = \exp(-V_{\text{QSD}}(z))$$
50:    for convex $V_{\text{QSD}}$
51: 
52: 3. $T_{\text{clone}}: \mathcal{P}(\Omega) \to \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$ is the mean-field cloning operator with:
53:    - Generator: $S[\rho] = S_{\text{src}}[\rho] - S_{\text{sink}}[\rho]$
54:    - Post-cloning noise variance: $\delta^2$
55:    - Cloning probability: $P_{\text{clone}}(V_i, V_j) = \min(1, V_j/V_i) \cdot \lambda_{\text{clone}}$
56: 
57: 4. **Fitness-QSD Anti-Correlation**:
58:    $$\log V[z] = -\lambda_{\text{corr}} V_{\text{QSD}}(z) + \log V_0$$
59:    for $\lambda_{\text{corr}} > 0$
60: 
61: 5. **Regularity bounds**:
62:    - $0 < \rho_{\min} \leq \rho_\mu(z) \leq \rho_{\max} < \infty$
63:    - $0 < V_{\min} \leq V[z] \leq V_{\max} < \infty$
64: 
65: **Conclusion (Conjectured):**
66: 
67: For $\mu' = T_{\text{clone}} \# \mu$ with infinitesimal time step $\tau$:
68: 
69: $$
70: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu' \| \pi) - D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) \leq -\tau \beta \, D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(\tau^2)
71: $$
72: 
73: where $\beta > 0$ (contraction rate) and $C_{\text{ent}} < 0$ (favorable entropy term) depend on the parameters.
